issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I asked below information in Appcelerator support chat on 21st Nov but still, I don't get any response from support team. It's just showing me hint text as "Not seen yet" Previously we get a response in a just a couple of hours max.

We are looking for below information :
Any Link or blog where I get info regarding Appcelerator certification : 
I need to know 
1. Price 
2. Content /syllabus 
3. Pattern of certification 
4. What kind of certification Appcelerator provides 
5. The validity of it ?

comments.body: Hello, Your question was answered. Please check. Also, See our university page for your query. https://university.appcelerator.com/. If you need anything feel free to reply back. Thanks.
